greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of digits of all distinct prime factors of n.
mathematica: ffi[x_] :=Flatten[FactorInteger[x]] lf[x_] :=Length[FactorInteger[x]] ba[x_] :=Table[Part[ffi[x], 2*j-1], {j, 1, lf[x]}] sd[x_] :=Apply[Plus, IntegerDigits[x]] tdp[x_] :=Flatten[Table[IntegerDigits[Part[ba[x], j]], {j, 1, lf[x]}], 1] sdp[x_] :=Apply[Plus, tdp[x]] Table[sdp[w], {w, 1, 150}]
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 21 2004
